src_original: yāvatke vidyaśadiśiloke sarvvatṛyaśca gatānarasiṁhāḥ ||
tgt_original: Bhadracaryādeśanā I yāvata keci daśad-diśi loke sarva-triyadhva-gatā nara-siṁhāḥ tān ahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ |

src_original: tānadbhavandami sarvi āśaṣān kāyatu vācemanena prasanaḥ || 2 ||  sarvvajinābhimūkhena manenaṁ bhadracaṁrī praṇidhāna balena || 3 ||
tgt_original: (1) II kṣetra-rajopana-kāya-pramāṇaiḥ sarva-jināna karomi praṇāmam sarva-jinābhimukhena manena bhadra-carī-praṇidhāna-balena |

src_original: eka rajāgrirameya buddhāna buddhasūtāna niṣarṇṇa kūmadhyā evama śeṣata dharmmāta dhātuṁ sarvvadhimūcyāmi pūrṇṇa jinebhiḥ || 4 ||
tgt_original: III eka-rajāgri rajopama-buddhā buddha-sutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye evam aśeṣata dharmata-dhātuṁ sarvādhimucyami pūrṇa jinebhiḥ |

src_original: teṣūca akṣaya varṇṇa samudrā sarvvasva rāga samudrā rutebhiḥ ||  sarvajināna guṇanbhaṇa mānastā nsūgatāṁ stavamī aha sarvvān || 5 ||
tgt_original: (2) IV teṣu ca akṣaya-varṇa-samudrān sarva-svarāṅga-samudra-rutebhiḥ sarva-jināna guṇān bhaṇamānas tān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān |

src_original: pūṣpavarebhiḥ camālya varebhiḥ bāyabile pana chatraverebhiḥ |  dīpa vare bhiḥ vatravarebhiḥ pūjanate ṣūjinona karomi || 6 ||
tgt_original: V puṣpa-varebhi ca mālya-varebhir vādya-vilepana-chatra-varebhiḥ (3)  dīpa-varebhi ca dhūpa-varebhiḥ pūjana teṣu jināna karomi |

src_original: vamtravarebhica gandha varebhiḥ cūrṇṇa paṭebhiḥ camerusamebhiḥ |
tgt_original: VI vastra-varebhi ca gandha-varebhiś cūrṇa-puṭebhi ca meru-samebhiḥ sarva-viśiṣṭa-viyūha-varebhiḥ pūjana teṣu jināna karomi |

src_original: yāca anuttara pūja udārā tānadhimūcyami sarva jinānāṁ |  bhadracarīṁ adhimūtki balena vandami pūjayāmi jina sarvvāna || 8 ||  yacca kṛtaṁ mayipāpa bhaveyāṁ rāga suddheṣatū (tuddheṣatu)  mohavaśana kāyatū vāca manena tathaiva pratideśa yāmi adbha sarvva || 9 ||  yacca daśadiśi pūṇya jagasya śikṣā aśaikṣa pratyeka jinānāṁ buddha sūtānatha sarvva jinānāṁ taṁ anūmodya mī adabha sarvvaṁ || 10 ||
tgt_original: VII yā ca anuttara pūja udārā tān adhimucyami sarva-jinānām bhadra-carī-adhimukti-balena vandami pūjayamī jina sarvān |  (4) VIII yac ca kṛtaṁ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu moha-vaśena kāyatu vāca manena tathaiva taṁ pratideśayamī ahu sarvam |  IX yac ca daśad-diśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa-aśaikṣa-pratyekajinānām buddha-sutān' atha sarva-jinānāṁ taṁ anumodayamī ahu sarvam |  (5) X ye ca daśad-diśi loka-pradīpā bodhi vibudhya asaṅgata prāptāḥ tān ahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthāṁś cakru anuttaru varttanatāyai |  XI ye'pi ca nirvṛti darśitu-kāmās tān abhiyācami prāñjali-bhūtaḥ kṣetra-rajopama-kalpa sthihantu sarva-jagasya hitāya sukhāya |

src_original: yacca śubhamiyasaṁcita kiṅcita bodhipanāyamayamī adabha sarvva || 13 ||
tgt_original: (6) XII vandana-pūjana-deśanatāya modan'-adhyeṣana-yācanatāya yac ca śubhaṁ mayi saṁcitu kiṁcid bodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam |

src_original: (179) pūjita bhontu atītak buddhā yeca ghṛyaṁtidaśadiśi loko yeca anāgate laghūbhontu pūrṇṇa manoratha bodhi vibūddhāḥ || 14 ||
tgt_original: (7) XIII pūjita bhontu atītaku buddhā ye ca dhriyanti daśad-diśi loke ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇa-manoratha bodhi-vibuddhā |

src_original: yāvata kaściddaśadiśi kṣetrāsta pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ ||  bodhidrūmenda gate bhikṣitetirbbuddha sūtebhiḥ cabhontu prapūrṇṇāḥ || 15 ||
tgt_original: XIV yāvata keci daśad-diśi kṣetrās te pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ bodhi-drumendra-gatebhi jinebhir buddha-sutebhi ca bhontu prapūrṇāḥ |

src_original: yāvata keciddaśa diśi satvāste sūkhitāḥ sadbhontu arogāḥ sarvva jagasyaca dhārmmi kū ārtho bhontu pradaśiṇa adhyantū āśāḥ || 16 ||
tgt_original: (8) XV yāvata keci daśad-diśi sattvās te sukhitāḥ sada bhontu arogāḥ sarva-jagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśā |

src_original: bodhicāritrca ahaṁ caramāṇo bhavijāttismara sarvva gatīṣū |  sarva sūjanma sūcyatyūpapatti pravarjito adbha nibhaveyā || 17 ||
tgt_original: XVI bodhi-cariṁ ca ahaṁ caramāṇo bhavi jāti-smaru sarva-gatīṣu sarvasu janmasu cyuty-upapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā |

src_original: sarvva jinānū śikṣa yamāṇo bhadracariṁ paripūra yamāṇaḥ śīlacarīṁ vimalāṁpariśuddhāṁ nityamaṇḍa macchidra careyaṁ || 18 ||
tgt_original: (9) XVII sarva-jinān' anuśikṣayamāṇo bhadra-cariṁ paripūrayamāṇaḥ śila-cariṁ vimalāṁ pariśuddhāṁ nityam akhaṇḍam acchidra careyam |

src_original: devarute bhiḥ canāgarūtebhiryakṣa kūbhāṇḍa manuṣya rūtebhiḥ |  yānica sarvvarutāṇi jagasṭā tānisūrūṣyadbha deśayi dharmmaṁ || 19 ||
tgt_original: XVIII deva-rutebhi ca nāga-rutebhir yakṣa-kumbhāṇḍa-manuṣya-rutebhiḥ yāni ca sarva-rutāni jagasya sarva-ruteṣv ahu deśayi dharmam |

src_original: ye khalū pāramitā svābhiyūktovo (180)  dhayiścibhamajātu vimuccet yo pipācapa dharmma āvaraṇī steṣūparikṣay bhātū aśeṣaṁ || 20 ||
tgt_original: (10) XIX peśalu pāramitāsv abhiyukto bodhiyi cittu ma jātu vimuhyet ye'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇīyās teṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam |

src_original: karmatukruśatumārapāthātāṁlokaga tāṁṣu vima ṛkti careyam |  padmayathā śasena aliktaḥ sūryaśaśigagane ca aśaktaḥ arci apāya duḥkhān praśamanto sarvajagats khisthāpanamānaḥ |  sarvajagasya hitāryacareyaṁ pāvatakṣatra yathā diśunātās || 21 ||
tgt_original: XX karmatu kleśatu māra-pathāto loka-gatīṣu vimuktu careyam padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūrya śaśī gagane'va asaktaḥ |  (11) XXI sarvi apāya-dukhāṁ praśamanto sarva-jagat sthāpayamānaḥ sarva-jagasya hitāya careyaṁ yāvata kṣetra-pathā diśa tāsu |

src_original: satvaṁcarī-am anurbakta māno bodhicarīṁ paripūrayamānaḥ |  bhadracarīṁ prathāvayamānaḥ sarvi-anāgata kalpacareyaṁ || 22 ||  ye sugatāgatamama yācaye tethi samāgabhūni tya bhave yā |
tgt_original: XXII sattva-cariṁ anuvartayamāno bodhi-cariṁ paripūrayamāṇaḥ bhadra-cariṁ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgata-kalpa careyam |

src_original: kākhanuvācanucetananovā ekacadiṁ praṇidhānaca raṁca || 23 ||
tgt_original: (12) XXIII ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā kāyatu vācatu cetanato vā eka-cari-praṇidhāna careyam |

src_original: ye pica mitrā matra hita kāmā bhadracarīṁ ye nidarthitāraḥ te śistamāga bhūnitya bhaktyā taśca-ahannanavirāma pijātuṁ (181) || 24 ||  saṁmukha nityamahaṁ ji na paśye būddhasūtopari nirvṛttanāthān |
tgt_original: XXIV ye'pi ca mitrā mama hita-kāmā bhadra-carīya nidarśayitāraḥ tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṁś ca ahaṁ na virāgayi jātu |

src_original: teṣuca pūjakare ye udārāḥ |  sarvi-anāgatya kalpanāvinnaḥ || 25 ||  dhārayamātajinā na sadharma bodhivara paridīpayamānaḥ ||  bhadraṁvarīca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvvi-anā gata kalpacare yaṁ || 26 ||
tgt_original: (13) XXV dhārayamāṇu jināna sad-dharmaṁ bodhi-cariṁ paridīpayamānaḥ bhadra-cariṁ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgata-kalpa careyam |  XXVI saṁmukha nityam ahaṁ jina paśye buddha-sutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān teṣu ca pūja kareya udārāṁ sarvi anāgata-kalpa-m-akhinnāḥ |

src_original: sarvvabhe'ṣūca saṁsāramāṇaḥ puṇyatujñā na tu akṣaya prāptaḥ |  prajñāpāyaca samādhi vimokṣaḥ sarvva guṇoḥ bhavi-akṣayakoṣaḥ || 27 ||
tgt_original: (14) XXVII sarva-bhaveṣu ca saṁsaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣaya-prāptaḥ prajña-upāya-samādhi-vimokṣaiḥ sarva-guṇair bhavi akṣaya-kośaḥ |

src_original: eka rajāgrirajomama kṣatrāḥ stūtrarakṣati acirtikriyaḥ buddhāna buddhasūtān niṣarṇṇa kūmadhye paścimaṁ bodhicarī varamāṇaḥ || 28 ||
tgt_original: XXVIII eka-rajāgri rajopama-kṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiya buddhān buddha-sutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhi-cariṁ caramāṇaḥ |

src_original: evam aśeṣat sarvvadiśāsū bālapaśeṣu triyadhva pramāṇān |
tgt_original: (15) XXIX evam aśeṣata sarva-diśāsu vāla-patheṣu triyadhva-pramāṇān buddha-samudr' atha kṣetra-samudrān otari cārika-kalpa samudrān |

src_original: buddha samudrīpa kṣatrasamudrā nānoharicorika kalpasamudrāṁ esvarāga samudraruteṣu sarvva jināna svarārga viśuddhiṁ |  sarvajagasya yathā śayadyāṣāṁ buddhasarasvatiṁ mokta (182) rinityaṁ ||
tgt_original: XXX eka-svarāṅga-samudra-rutebhiḥ sarva-jināna svarāṅga-viśuddhim sarva-jagasya yath' āśaya-ghoṣān buddha-sarasvatim otari nityam |

src_original: te ṣucakṣatrayaghoṣaruteṣu sarvatryaghva gatāna jinānāṁ vakranaya parivarttaya mānā buddhivalena ahaṁ praviśeyaṁ || 31 ||  akakṣaṇena anāgata sarvvāna kalpapraveśa ahaṁ praviśeyaṁ |
tgt_original: (16) XXXI teṣu ca akṣaya-ghoṣa-ruteṣu sarva-triyadhva-gatāna jinānām cakra-nayaṁ parivartayamāno buddhi-balena ahaṁ praviśeyam |  XXXII eka-kṣaṇena anāgata sarvān kalpa-praveśa ahaṁ praviśeyam ye'pi ca kalpa triyadhva-pramāṇās tān kṣaṇa-koṭi-praviṣṭa careyam |  (17) XXXIII ye ce triyadhva-gatā nara-siṁhāṁs tān ahu paśyiya eka-kṣaṇena teṣu ca gocarim otari nityaṁ māya-gatena vimokṣa-balena |

src_original: yacatryaghvagatā narasiṁhāḥ tānahupaśviya ekakṣaṇena |  evama śeṣatasarvvadiśāsu dobhavikṣatra ripuhajinānāṁ || 34 ||
tgt_original: XXXIV ye ca triyadhvasu kṣetra-viyūhāṁs tān abhinirhari eka-rajāgre evam aśeṣata sarva-diśāsu otari kṣetra-viyūha jinānām |

src_original: yeva anāgata lokapradīpā teṣu vibudhya nacakrapravṛtti yepica darśananiṣṭha praśā nti tāṇa hū sa pyū pasaṁ kramināyāte || 35 ||
tgt_original: (18) XXXV ye ca anāgata loka-pradīpās teṣu vibudhyana cakra-pravṛttim nirvṛti-darśana niṣṭha-praśāntiṁ sarvi ahaṁ upasaṁkrami nāthān |

src_original: adhivalene samanta ja veṇa yā na va leṇa samanta mukhena |  caryyavalena samanta guṇena maitrī va lena samanta gatena || 36 ||  puṇyava (183) lena samanta śubhena pāṇavalena asaṁgatena |
tgt_original: XXXVI ṛddhi-balena samanta-javena yāna-balena samanta-mukhena carya-balena samanta-guṇena maitra-balena samanta-gatena (19)

src_original: prajñā-upāya samādhivalena bodhibalaṁ samudāpayamānaḥ || 37 ||
tgt_original: XXXVII puṇya-balena samanta-śubhena jñāna-balena asaṅga-gatena prajña-upāya-samādhi-balena bodhi-balaṁ samudānayamānaḥ |

src_original: karmmabalaṁ pariśodhaya mānaḥ kleśabalaṁ parimarddaya mānaḥ |
tgt_original: XXXVIII karma-balaṁ pariśodhayamānaḥ kleśa-balaṁ parimardayamānaḥ māra-balaṁ abalaṁ karamāṇaḥ pūrayi bhadra-carī-bala sarvān |

src_original: kṣetra samudra viśodhayamānaḥ satvasamudra vimocayamānaḥ |  dharmma samudra vipaśyayamāno jñānasamudra vigāhayamānaḥ || 39 ||
tgt_original: (20) XXXIX kṣetra-samudra viśodhayamānaḥ sattva-samudra vimocayamānaḥ dharma-samudra vipaśyayamāno jñāna-samudra vigāhayamānaḥ |

src_original: caryyasamudra viśodhayamānaḥ pratidhisamudra prapūra yamānaḥ |  buddhasamagadra prapūjayamānaḥ kalpa samudra raceyamākhinnaḥ || 40 ||
tgt_original: XL carya-samudra viśodhayamānaḥ praṇidhi-samudra prapūrayamāṇaḥ buddha-samudra prapūjayamānaḥ kalpa-samudra careyam akhinnaḥ |

src_original: yevabhraya dhvagatāna jinānāṁ bodhīcarīṁ praṇidhāna viśeṣāḥ |  tānabhdapūriya sarvvi-aśeṣāna bhadracarīṁye vibuddhi yabodhiṁ || 41 ||
tgt_original: (21) XLI ye ca triyadhva-gatāna jinānāṁ bodhi-cari-praṇidhāna-viśeṣāḥ tān ahu pūraya sarvi aśeṣān bhadra-carīya vibudhyiya bodhim |

src_original: yeṣṭha kūyaḥ sutusarvva jinānāṁ yasya canāmasamantabhadraḥ |  tasyavinduṣya sabhāgacarīya nāmayamīkuśalaṁ imu sarvvāṁ || 42 ||
tgt_original: XLII jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarva-jinānāṁ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ tasya vidusya sabhāga-carīye nāmayamī kuśalaṁ imu sarvam |

src_original: kāya tu vācamanasya viśuddheścaryya vidhya thakṣa (184)  traviśuddhiḥ |  yādṛśanāma nahā viduṣya tādṛśa bho ntu (nṇu)  samaṁmatena || 43 ||
tgt_original: (22) XLIII kāyatu vāca manasya viśuddhiś carya-viśuddhy atha kṣetra-viśuddhiḥ yādṛśa nāmana bhadra-vidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṁ mama tena |

src_original: bhadravarīya samanta śubhāye maṁjuśrīya praṇidhānavareyaṁ ||  sarvvi-anā gatakalpa makhinnaḥ pūrayitāṁ hiya sarvi-aśeṣāṁ || 44 ||
tgt_original: XLIV bhadra-carīya samanta-śubhāye mañjuśirī-praṇidhāna careyam sarvi anāgata-kalpa-m -akhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṁ kriya sarvi aśeṣām |

src_original: māra pramātha bhaveyavarīye ||  māva pramāṇū bhavaye guṇānāṁ |  apramāṇūvariyā pathihitvā jānayi sarvvi vikūrvvi tuteṣāṁ || 45 ||
tgt_original: (23) XLV no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām apramāṇa cariyāya sthihitvā jānayi sarvi vikurvitu teṣām |

src_original: yāvata tiṣṭhanabhasyabhaveyā atva aśeṣata niṣṭha tuva |  karmmatu krṛśatu yāvatatiṣṭha tāvata riṣṭhamama prāṇidhānaṁ || 46 ||
tgt_original: XLVI yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvata-niṣṭha mama praṇidhānam |

src_original: yaccadaśa diśikṣatra anantā ratna alaṁkṛta dadayujinānāṁ |  divyacamānuṣa saukhya viśiṣṭhā nakṣatra rajopama kalpa dadeyā || 47 ||
tgt_original: (24) XLVII ye ca daśad-diśi kṣetra anantā ratna-alaṁkṛtu dadyu jinānām divya ca mānuṣa saukhya viśiṣṭāṁ kṣetra-rajopama-kalpa dadeyam |

src_original: yaśca-imaṁ parinā manarājaṁ śṛtvasajjana padmadhimuktiṁ |  bodhicarā manu prārthayamāno atruviḥ śiṣṭha bhave damū puṇyaṁ || 48 ||
tgt_original: XLVIII yaś ca imaṁ pariṇāmana-rājaṁ śrutva sakṛj janayed adhimuktim bodhi-varām anuprārthayamāno agru viśiṣṭa bhaved imu puṇyam |

src_original: varjjitatena bhavanti apāyā varjjitatena bhavanti kumitrāḥ |  kṣiprasapaśyatitaṁ amitābha paśya samudra (185)
tgt_original: (25) XLIX varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ kṣipru sa paśyati taṁ amitābhaṁ yasy imu bhadra-cari-praṇidhānam |

src_original: cariṁpraṇidhānaṁ || 49 ||  lobhasa ddha (cpra)  sajīva tuteṣāṁ svāgatute imānu janmaḥ ||  yādṛśasohisamanta bhadrastepi tathānaci (rī)
tgt_original: L lābha sulabdha sujīvitu teṣāṁ sv-āgata te imu mānuṣa janma yādṛśa so hi samantatabhadras te'pi tathā na-cireṇa bhavanti |

src_original: ṇabhavaḥnti || 50 ||  pāpakpactra anantaripāṇiḥ yena ajñāna va śena kṛtāniḥ |
tgt_original: (26) LI pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñāna-vaśena kṛtāni so imu bhadra-cariṁ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu bhoti aśeṣam |
